title: Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information. HELP!

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Hey Guys,

So i open up League of Legends and when i get onto the launcher home page, up comes a notice which reads ''Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information. '' Underneath this is a retry button, which i have clicked many times over and it has done nothing to resolve the problem. I assume that this glitch is caused by the recent patch update (6.3) but im not 100% sure. I really hope riot can help me out with this. I 
enjoy playing League of Legends a lot and a fix for this issue would be much appreciated. Any help to fix this glitch from the community is also very appreciated. If anyone else has the same problem please let me know. 

Thanks, BI0 HAZ4D

replies.body:
Hello i solved the issue by
1. uninstalling league of legends 
2. deleting the folder Riot Game in c:
3. And the last thing that i think did the trick was deleting any League of Legends related thing in the folder appdata which you acces by typing %appdata% in the windows search bar.

Hope i think it fixes it!

This works 100%, u just gotta delete the game ( and everything about it) and install it again
Worked for me for past 3 times 
But still every time there is a big patch comin up i gotta reinstall the game
really annoying..
What also helps is to free up space on Computer

Hello there,

I suggest that you go into your client and repair it.
If that does not work you can generate client 'logs' from the same screen as you use to repair the client.,
Attach those logs to a support ticket with the technical support at Riot and they will help you as they are the best equipped to.
 Make sure that you completely wipe the client from your computer and reinstall it.

Hope I helped :3
~Reported4Verbal~ OCE~  Always Happy To Help! :)
ARAM Main! In SR, 
Main Support {{champion:37}} {{champion:4}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:8}} 
Fill Except Top & Jungle

Hey,
Thanks for the tips. I tried to repair client, which didn't work. But hopefully your second suggestion of sending the logs to player support will help.
Any help is very appreciated.
:D
Turns out it cant be fixed. The only way to solve the problem would be to purchase a new pc. Thanks for the help though.
Can be fixed check my post
> This is happening to me and I have already uninstalled and reinstalled it still comes up with unspecific error please help I wanna play league{{champion:157}}
i am have the same problem please any one know the answer tell me :D

> [{quoted}](name=BsK,realm=EUNE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=zBsqyI1g,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-07-27T21:53:52.096+0000)

Hey BsK, 

Can you try the solutions in this thread and let me know if that resolves your problem?

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/PuEpZLzo-having-patching-issues-try-these-solutions

Thanks!

Hey there!

Can you give the solutions in the following thread a shot, and let me know whether anything works for you?

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/PuEpZLzo-having-patching-issues-try-these-solutions

Cheers!

Hey Wuks,
i checked out and tried everything in the link you gave me.
Many of the solutions however said to go to certain file locations in league of legends, and some of the files i just didn't have.
Past the RADS file i was missing some files. I re installed 3 times and i am still missing some files. I even filled up a lot of disk space like you said at the bottom of the post. Thanks for the help, but i think this is going to be very hard to fix.

Hey there,

Could you try and [force a re-patch](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq5) and let me know if that helps.
